LanguageData.BloodFog_Thought_A.stages.0.label: <color=#7f0000>巨大的压抑感</color>
LanguageData.BloodFog_Thought_A.stages.0.description: 我感觉到一种说不出来的很冷... \n\n这太恐怖了...
LanguageData.BloodFog_Thought_B.stages.0.label: <color=#7f0000>无法忍受的压抑</color>
LanguageData.BloodFog_Thought_Ferian_A.stages.0.label: 熟悉的感觉
LanguageData.BloodFog_Thought_Ferian_B.stages.0.label: 令人作呕的肉块
LanguageData.BloodFog_Thought_Ferian_B.stages.0.descr: 看上去是其他菲狐的杰作呢~ \n\n那么那些成功的小可爱们在哪呢？
